price: 21. Or have they taken (for worship) âlihah (gods) from the earth who raise the dead?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
